Uses of Package
bartMachine

  • Packages that use bartMachine 
    Package Description
    bartMachine
    The code for the implementation of the BART algorithm as described in detail in:
  • Classes in bartMachine used by bartMachine 
    Class and Description
    bartMachine_a_base
    The base class for any BART implementation.
    bartMachine_b_hyperparams
    This portion of the code controls hyperparameters for the BART algorithm as well as properties and transformations of the response variable.
    bartMachine_c_debug
    This portion of the code used to have many debug functions.
    bartMachine_d_init
    This portion of the code initializes the Gibbs sampler
    bartMachine_e_gibbs_base
    This portion of the code performs everything in the Gibbs sampling except for the posterior sampling itself
    bartMachine_f_gibbs_internal
    This portion of the code that performs the posterior sampling in the Gibbs sampler except for the Metropolis-Hastings tree search step
    bartMachine_g_mh
    This portion of the code performs the Metropolis-Hastings tree search step
    bartMachine_g_mh.Steps
    the types of steps in the Metropolis-Hastings tree search
    bartMachine_h_eval
    This portion of the code performs the evaluation / prediction on the BART model
    bartMachine_i_prior_cov_spec
    This portion of the code implements the informed prior information on covariates feature.
    bartMachineRegression
    The class that is instantiated to build a Regression BART model
    bartMachineRegressionMultThread
    This class handles the parallelization of many Gibbs chains over many CPU cores to create one BART regression model.
    bartMachineTreeNode
    The class that stores all the information in one node of the BART trees
    Classifier
    The base class for all machine learning / statistical-learning algorithms.
    Classifier.ErrorTypes
    a variable that represents the different error calculation types
    TreeArrayIllustration
    This class builds illustrations of many trees.
